headline: Comcast Boosts Xfinity Speeds to Drive Broadband & Wireless Growth
summary: CMCSA expands speeds of Xfinity Internet prepaid plans as a response to a 139,000 broadband subscriber decline.

headline: Comcast Brings Day of Giving to Augusta Communities
summary: This week, Comcast returned to Augusta, Georgia for a day of giving back to local communities following the ongoing restoration efforts post-hurricane Helene. As the city still recovers from rising homelessness and devastation left behind from weather disasters, the organization, in partnership with local community leaders, reverberated its commitment to uplifting the city through a day dedicated to bringing positive impact.

headline: Netflix, Amazon and Peacock Go Big on Popular YouTubers
summary: YouTube creators are beginning to get their Hollywood moment.  Streamers including  Netflix  NBCUniversal’s Peacock and Amazon.com are wooing web creators—and their legions of fans—for new series or spinoffs, courting a category of performers whose fare rarely used to make the jump to subscription streaming services.  The change is a sign of Google-owned YouTube’s tightening grip on America’s TV time.
